title: Simple Calculator Using PHP, HTML & CSS
description: This beginner-friendly project demonstrates how to perform basic arithmetic operations—addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division—using server-side PHP logic and a clean front-end interface.

title: Q&A Website Demo | Ask & Answer Platform Using PHP, Bootstrap, HTML & CSS
description: This is a demo of a Question & Answer (Q&A) platform built using PHP, Bootstrap, HTML, and CSS. Users can ask questions, post answers, browse by category, and search content easily.

title: Typing Speed Test Website Demo | Java Servlets, HTML, CSS & JS
description: Take a quick look at a responsive typing‑speed website powered by Java Servlets on the backend and vanilla HTML, CSS & JavaScript on the front.
